data.name: SVFI - Professional
data.detailed_description:
SVFI Professional Version - the Professional Version of SVFI(Squirrel Video Frame Interpolation)

- Video super-resolution(video enhance) module

- More options for rendering, fine-tuning output quality

- Complete task queue management

- Added settings presets panel, save and apply your settings at ease

- Powerful Toolbox, unleash the potential of your interpolated footage

- Dolby Vision, HDR10+ Interpolation Support

- Currently Not Supported for AMD Graphic Cards
data.about_the_game:
SVFI Professional Version - the Professional Version of SVFI(Squirrel Video Frame Interpolation)

- Video super-resolution(video enhance) module

- More options for rendering, fine-tuning output quality

- Complete task queue management

- Added settings presets panel, save and apply your settings at ease

- Powerful Toolbox, unleash the potential of your interpolated footage

- Dolby Vision, HDR10+ Interpolation Support

- Currently Not Supported for AMD Graphic Cards
data.short_description: SVFI Professional Version - Indicates the Professional Version of SVFI A video, picture enhancement kit More support: - Added video super-resolution modules: WAIFU2X, RealESR, REALSR - More rendering options, fine-tuning output quality - More complete task queue management
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® MX250 / NVIDIA Graphics Cards with Maxwell Architecture® (GTX 750Ti+)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: AMD® 3990WX
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® RTX® 3090, 2060+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
